channel.title: Few fixes i could use some guidance on
channel.description:
For the record I'm using mezzyscape. [s]1: how can I edit items i.g; holy book, unholy book etc. to not require quests to use. (what file am I editing? Is it server or client side?)[/s] Fixed this one with mezzy's help. 2: prayers do nothing (well the icon shows up but they don't block) How can I edit this? [s]3: players can't trade without doing the first quest, (First quest won't finish, how can i remove this?) [/s] Got this one as well.
I have other questions; but this is the most important for now. its just a private server, with a few friends.

item.title: Few fixes i could use some guidance on
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

Add me on skype and I will help you gladly with this and more. My skype is: lardain rullens

Read full topic

item.title: Few fixes i could use some guidance on
item.dc:creator: @screamingismyair screamingismyair
item.description:
@screamingismyair wrote:

For the record I’m using mezzyscape.
1: how can I edit items i.g; holy book, unholy book etc.
to not require quests to use. (what file am I editing? Is it server or client side?)
Fixed this one with mezzy’s help.
2: prayers do nothing (well the icon shows up but they don’t block)
How can I edit this?
3: players can’t trade without doing the first quest, (First quest won’t finish, how can i remove this?)

Got this one as well.

I have other questions; but this is the most important for now.
its just a private server, with a few friends.

Read full topic
